p: JJS: We concur with the reviewer that PCR and IgM represent very different pathophysiological underpinnings of flavivirus infection, and that, as a post-infectious phenomenon, GBS would more likely be expected to be positive by IgM, rather than PCR, testing. So, per above, we are including the breakdown of PCR+, IgM+, and PCR / IgM+. This can be found in New Table 2.
